svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.0.14"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="4lxjozlhvZVVYpbrBgzX"> <mxGraphModel dx="1120" dy="1568" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-1" value="<b>Application Performance</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="-1048" width="170" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-2" value="<b>1.&nbsp;Code Optimization</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="119" y="-965" width="137" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-3" value="- reduce loops/iterations" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="127" y="-937" width="146" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-4" value="- write optimized code" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="127" y="-911" width="135" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-5" value="- use proper data strctures lik maps, sets for loops array o(n)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="-885" width="339" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-6" value="- reduce data base call/ repo call" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="134" y="-859" width="191" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-7" value="<b>2. Database optimization</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="-747" width="159" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-8" value="- indexing" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="145" y="-721" width="70" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-9" value="- proper schema design/ entity design with efficient relationship" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="145" y="-695" width="352" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-10" value="- optimize query" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="149" y="-669" width="103" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-11" value="- partitioning &amp; shadowing" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="149" y="-646" width="156" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-12" value="<b>3. Caching</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="132" y="-614" width="79" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-13" value="- redis cache" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="132" y="-588" width="87" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-15" value="- in memory cache for frequent access data" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="-564" width="249" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-16" value="- asynchronous programming" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="134" y="-833" width="174" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-17" value="<b>4. Monotoring &amp; tracing</b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="127" y="-530" width="153" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-18" value="- check tracing what timing it is taking for interservice call" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="127" y="-500" width="320" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-19" value="Text" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="372" y="-15" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-20" value="<b>Design Patterns</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="365" y="39" width="120" height="43" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-21" value="<h2 data-start="254" data-end="281">1. <strong data-start="260" data-end="281">Singleton Pattern</strong></h2><h3 data-start="282" data-end="297">í ½í´¹ Problem:</h3><p data-start="298" data-end="377">Ensures a class has only one instance and provides a global access point to it.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="174" y="107.00333333333349" width="446" height="131" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-22" value="<h2 data-start="856" data-end="881">2. <strong data-start="862" data-end="881">Factory Pattern</strong></h2><h3 data-start="882" data-end="897">í ½í´¹ Problem:</h3><p data-start="898" data-end="956">Used to create objects without specifying the instantiation logic.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="174.0033333333335" y="229" width="332" height="131" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-23" value="<h2 data-start="1474" data-end="1501">3. <strong data-start="1480" data-end="1501">Prototype Pattern</strong></h2><h3 data-start="1502" data-end="1517">í ½í´¹ Problem:</h3><p data-start="1518" data-end="1578">Creates a new instance of a bean every time it is requested.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="173.99666666666673" y="363" width="347" height="131" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-24" value="<h2 data-start="2760" data-end="2785">4. <strong data-start="2766" data-end="2785">Builder Pattern</strong></h2><h3 data-start="2786" data-end="2801">í ½í´¹ Problem:</h3><p data-start="2802" data-end="2875">Creates complex objects step by step instead of using a long constructor.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="174" y="484.9966666666667" width="416" height="131" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-25" value="<h2 data-start="3278" data-end="3319">5. <strong data-start="3284" data-end="3319">Observer Pattern (Event-Driven)</strong></h2><h3 data-start="3320" data-end="3335">í ½í´¹ Problem:</h3><p data-start="3336" data-end="3385">Notifies multiple objects about changes in state.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="179.00666666666672" y="610.0033333333334" width="322" height="131" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-26" value="<h2 data-start="5621" data-end="5648">6. <strong data-start="5627" data-end="5648">Decorator Pattern</strong></h2><h3 data-start="5649" data-end="5664">í ½í´¹ Problem:</h3><p data-start="5665" data-end="5727">Allows behavior to be added dynamically to individual objects.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="179.00666666666675" y="753.0033333333334" width="356" height="131" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-27" value="Text" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="375" y="1090" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-28" value="<b>Design Principles</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="346" y="1136" width="120" height="38" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-29" value="
<h2 data-end="5679" data-start="5641">2ï¸âƒ£ <strong data-end="5679" data-start="5648">DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself)</strong></h2><p data-end="5802" data-start="5680">í ½í´¹ <strong data-end="5697" data-start="5683">Definition</strong>: Avoid duplication by reusing code.<br data-end="5736" data-start="5733">í ½í´¹ <strong data-end="5747" data-start="5739">Why?</strong>: Reduces code redundancy and makes maintenance easier.</p>

" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="153.0033333333335" y="1353" width="550" height="114" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-30" value="<h2 data-start="261" data-end="293">1ï¸âƒ£ <strong data-start="268" data-end="288">SOLID Principles</strong> í ¼í¿›</h2><p data-start="294" data-end="412">SOLID is a set of five design principles that help developers create software that is <strong data-start="380" data-end="411">easy to maintain and extend</strong>.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="153" y="1220.996666666667" width="550" height="114" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-31" value="<h2 data-start="6050" data-end="6090">3ï¸âƒ£ <strong data-start="6057" data-end="6090">KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid)</strong></h2><p data-start="6091" data-end="6231">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="6094" data-end="6108">Definition</strong>: <strong data-start="6110" data-end="6164">Keep code simple and avoid unnecessary complexity.</strong><br data-start="6164" data-end="6167">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="6170" data-end="6178">Why?</strong>: Simple code is easier to read, debug, and maintain.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="153.0033333333335" y="1531.996666666667" width="414" height="114" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-33" value="<h3 data-start="414" data-end="469"><strong data-start="418" data-end="423">S</strong> â€“ <strong data-start="426" data-end="467">Single Responsibility Principle (SRP)</strong></h3><p data-start="470" data-end="634">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="473" data-end="487">Definition</strong>: A class should have <strong data-start="509" data-end="538">only one reason to change</strong>.<br data-start="539" data-end="542">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="545" data-end="553">Why?</strong>: If a class has multiple responsibilities, changes in one part may break others</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="181.99666666666675" y="2291" width="490" height="108" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-34" value="<h3 data-start="1392" data-end="1437"><strong data-start="1396" data-end="1401">O</strong> â€“ <strong data-start="1404" data-end="1435">Open/Closed Principle (OCP)</strong></h3><p data-start="1438" data-end="1609">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="1441" data-end="1455">Definition</strong>: <strong data-start="1457" data-end="1526">A class should be open for extension but closed for modification.</strong><br data-start="1526" data-end="1529">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="1532" data-end="1540">Why?</strong>: Avoid modifying existing code whenever new functionality is needed.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="181.99666666666675" y="2390.0033333333336" width="480" height="108" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-35" value="<h3 data-start="2561" data-end="2614"><strong data-start="2565" data-end="2570">L</strong> â€“ <strong data-start="2573" data-end="2612">Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP)</strong></h3><p data-start="2615" data-end="2775">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="2618" data-end="2632">Definition</strong>: <strong data-start="2634" data-end="2719">A subclass should be replaceable with its parent class without breaking the code.</strong><br data-start="2719" data-end="2722">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="2725" data-end="2733">Why?</strong>: Ensures <strong data-start="2743" data-end="2759">polymorphism</strong> works properly.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="185.83" y="2492" width="550" height="122" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-36" value="<h3 data-start="3565" data-end="3620"><strong data-start="3569" data-end="3574">I</strong> â€“ <strong data-start="3577" data-end="3618">Interface Segregation Principle (ISP)</strong></h3><p data-start="3621" data-end="3776">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="3624" data-end="3638">Definition</strong>: <strong data-start="3640" data-end="3709">Clients should not be forced to implement methods they donâ€™t use.</strong><br data-start="3709" data-end="3712">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="3715" data-end="3723">Why?</strong>: Avoids bloated interfaces with unnecessary methods.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="188.83000000000004" y="2593.996666666667" width="489" height="108" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-37" value="Text" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="375" y="2185" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-38" value="<h3 data-start="4487" data-end="4541"><strong data-start="4491" data-end="4496">D</strong> â€“ <strong data-start="4499" data-end="4539">Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP)</strong></h3><p data-start="4542" data-end="4675">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="4545" data-end="4559">Definition</strong>: <strong data-start="4561" data-end="4618">Depend on abstractions, not concrete implementations.</strong><br data-start="4618" data-end="4621">í ½í´¹ <strong data-start="4624" data-end="4632">Why?</strong>: Allows flexibility and easy unit testing.</p>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="188.8333333333335" y="2716.0033333333336" width="425" height="108" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="69KnKX0sTT6aRdsaBIz_-39" value="<h2 style="text-align: left; text-wrap-mode: wrap;" data-start="261" data-end="293"><strong data-start="268" data-end="288">SOLID&nbsp;</strong></h2>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="2202" width="78" height="63" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

í ½í´¹ Definition: Avoid duplication by reusing code.
í ½í´¹ Why?: Reduces code redundancy and makes maintenance easier.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 548px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2276px; margin-left: 36px;

div.p: SOLID is a set of five design principles that help developers create software that is easy to maintain and extend.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 412px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2587px; margin-left: 36px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p:
í ½í´¹ Definition: Keep code simple and avoid unnecessary complexity.
í ½í´¹ Why?: Simple code is easier to read, debug, and maintain.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 488px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3346px; margin-left: 65px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p:
í ½í´¹ Definition: A class should have only one reason to change.
í ½í´¹ Why?: If a class has multiple responsibilities, changes in one part may break others

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 478px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3445px; margin-left: 65px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p:
í ½í´¹ Definition: A class should be open for extension but closed for modification.
í ½í´¹ Why?: Avoid modifying existing code whenever new functionality is needed.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 548px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3547px; margin-left: 69px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.p:
í ½í´¹ Definition: A subclass should be replaceable with its parent class without breaking the code.
í ½í´¹ Why?: Ensures polymorphism works properly.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 487px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3649px; margin-left: 72px;

div.p:
í ½í´¹ Definition: Clients should not be forced to implement methods they donâ€™t use.
í ½í´¹ Why?: Avoids bloated interfaces with unnecessary methods.

í ½í´¹ Definition: Depend on abstractions, not concrete implementations.
í ½í´¹ Why?: Allows flexibility and easy unit testing.
